title: FS/FT: N28 Clarkson & Buffalo Bill & two N172 Patsy Tebeaus (all SGC graded)
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS/FT: N28 Clarkson & Buffalo Bill & two N172 Patsy Tebeaus (all SGC graded)
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell or trade two (2) Patsy Tebeau Old Judges (SGC 20 & 30), an N28 John Clarkson (SGC 70) and an N28 Buffalo Bill (also a 70).  Paypal accepted.  See scans below.  600 dpi scans available by email.  Thanks for looking.

Eric Angyal (eangyal@roadrunner.com)

Tebeau batting - $325
Tebeau throwing - $295
Clarkson - $995
Cody - $600
